rsp.name: Rock Paper Scissors
rsp.description: Rock Paper Scissors is a classic game of luck and strategy. Two players simultaneously choose one of three figures: rock, scissors, or paper. Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, and paper beats rock.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Spy is a game where players try to figure out who the spy is by asking each other questions. One player gets the role of a spy and tries to guess the secret word without revealing their identity.

tod.name: Truth or Dare
tod.description: Truth or Dare is a classic party game where players take turns choosing between truth and dare. Choosing truth means the player must honestly answer a question, while dare requires them to complete a task.

five_second.name: 5 Seconds
five_second.description: 5 Seconds is a fast and fun game where players must name three things in five seconds. For example, three types of fruit or three famous movies. If the player doesn't make it in time, the turn goes to the next player.

codenames.name: Codenames
codenames.description: Codenames is a team game where players try to guess words using clues. Two teams compete to be the first to find all their codenames on the board. A clue consists of one word and a number indicating how many related words there are.
codenames.title: Codenames

tour.teamName:
There are two teams, Blue and Red
(in parentheses, the number of players in the team)
tour.team-progress: The number of points needed to win (Blue starts, so they always have 1 more point)
tour.grid: Here are the words that captains need to encode and players need to guess
tour.usersTitle: Add players to whom you will give words
tour.users: Using qr code or sending a ready link through social networks
tour.captainTitle: Add the captain of the second team
tour.captain: Using qr code or sending a ready link through social networks
tour.startTitle: After pressing, you will see the color map of words
tour.start:
1. Only captains see this map
2. They try to combine words by different meanings
3. The Blue team starts first (they have 1 more guessed word)
4. Whoever guesses all the words first wins
5. Players will mark words on their phones (but the captain can also do it)
6. Black word is a bomb
(choose = lose)
